How about an armor concealer with 2 or more sides that you can rub to morph. That way if it's a more rugged armor concealer, you can simply rub it and change it to a more formal look for more formal events, without ever having to take your armor off.

Unlikely as they are two different scripts, but something that would likely appeal to a number of people, aside from the noun restrictions on armor concealers.
